_header: From heaven was sent an angel of light
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 448.
Subjects: carols, Annunciation; Virgin Mary, Annunciation to
_description: A carol of the Annunciation — seven 5-line stanzas and burden: ‘Now we shuld syng and say newell / Quia missus est angelus Gabriel’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
ffrom hevyn was sent an angell of lightVnto a cyte that Nazareth
                    hyght…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Now make we mery hym beforne & syng newellQuia missus
                        est angelus GabriellExplicit
